vehicles.name: PSLV
vehicles.payload: 1.7 t to LEO / 1.1 t to SSO
vehicles.description: The workhorse four-stage launcher mixing solid + liquid stages. Ideal for EO missions and commercial rideshares.

vehicles.name: GSLV Mk-II
vehicles.description: Cryogenic upper stage enables GEO comsat deployments. Powers missions like GISAT and regional communications.

vehicles.name: LVM3
vehicles.payload: 4 t to GTO / 8 t to LEO
vehicles.description: Heavy-lift with twin S200 boosters and CE-20 cryogenic stage. Selected for Gaganyaan crew and deep-space missions.
